decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Design & Access Statement; 2284-100A Existing and Proposed Front Elevation; 3067-DR-8104-P02 Existing and Proposed Door Details; Drawing 1 Window Details; Drawing 2 Window Details; Drawing 3 Window Details; Drawing 4 Window Details; Drawing 5 Window Details; Justification for replacement the front elevation window
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be identical to what stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement of two existing white timber single-glazed casement windows and blue timber door with single glazing on the front elevation with white timber double-glazed casement windows and blue timber door with double glazing
